Uses of Interface
sage.camera.ICamera

  • Packages that use ICamera 
    Package Description
    sage.camera  
    sage.camera.controllers  
    sage.input  
    sage.input.action  
    sage.renderer  
    sage.renderer.jogl  

    • Uses of ICamera in sage.camera

      Classes in sage.camera that implement ICamera 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCamera
      AbstractCamera is an abstract base class from which all SAGE camera implementations are derived.
      class  JOGLCamera
      Class JOGLCamera provides an implementation of the ICamera interface using the JOGL Java interface to OpenGL.

      Constructor and Description

      Constructs an AbstractCameraController which controls the specified ICamera.

      Constructs a FPSCameraController which controls the specified ICamera and it attached to a SceneNode target.

    • Uses of ICamera in sage.input

      Methods in sage.input that return ICamera 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ICamera ThirdPersonCameraController.getCamera()
      Returns the camera which this ThirdPersonCameraController is controlling.
      Methods in sage.input with parameters of type ICamera 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ThirdPersonCameraController.setCamera(ICamera cam)
      Sets the camera to be controlled by this ThirdPersonCameraController.
      Constructors in sage.input with parameters of type ICamera 
      Constructor and Description
      ThirdPersonCameraController(ICamera cam, SceneNode target, IInputManager inputMgr, java.lang.String inputControllerName)
      Constructs a ThirdPersonCameraController that allows orbiting the specified camera around the specified target SceneNode using the controls provided by the specified IInputManager and input controller.

    • Uses of ICamera in sage.input.action

      Constructors in sage.input.action with parameters of type ICamera 
      Constructor and Description
      LookDownAction(ICamera camera, float speed) 
      LookLeftAction(ICamera camera, float speed) 
      LookRightAction(ICamera camera, float speed) 
      LookUpAction(ICamera camera, float speed) 
      MouseLookAction(ICamera camera, float speed, IInputManager handler) 
      MoveBackwardAction(ICamera camera, float speed, RunAction run, boolean lockToGroundPlane) 
      MoveDownAction(ICamera camera, float speed, RunAction run)
      Constructs a MoveDownAction object which moves a given ICamera object in the opposite direction of that of the camera's up vector).
      MoveForwardAction(ICamera camera, float speed, RunAction run, boolean lockToGroundPlane)
      Constructs a MoveForwardAction object which moves a given ICamera object forward in the direction it is pointed (as defined by the camera's view direction vector).
      MoveLeftAction(ICamera camera, float speed, RunAction run) 
      MoveRightAction(ICamera camera, float speed, RunAction run) 
      MoveUpAction(ICamera camera, float speed, RunAction run)
      Constructs a MoveUpAction object which moves a given ICamera object in the direction of the camera's up vector).
      ResetCameraAction(ICamera camera)
      Constructs an action which resets a camera to the default position and orientation specified by static constants in AbstractCamera.
      RollLeftAction(ICamera camera, float speed) 
      RollRightAction(ICamera camera, float speed)
